body: I have read Netoraserare. In this story all the fuckery and shenanigans happen before marriage. I don't remember all the details but FMC saw her mother cheat with the professor and then wanted revenge or something but ended up falling in love with the married professor herself. She also gets obsessed with cheating, why people cheat, etc. and has sex with mc and messes up the professor's life to find it. The doujin has quite a few interesting stuff but it ends in normalcy for our MC. It is similar to quite a lot of psycho FMC manga where mc gets taken for a ride, corrupted but eventually breaks free and returns to normal life.
Revolnrop you should know though, marriage isnt the end in this author's doujins... if this really is the end of this story then thats a really boring ending
The girl is a fuckin sociopath, and not even the fun kind.
@Maveickkx He married a completely different girl. Before the end, he properly confesses and she turns him down and they amicably go their separate ways.
In the end he married the girl? To bad, the other girl, seem like a nice girl.
even tho theres no translation... i know this is another ntr... how many ntrs do i read bcuz of those bait codes ;<
This is heaven yet hell because of no translations. Nevertheless, NTR Sect will fap on this.
damn man  year and no translation :/
how is this not translated but that other story is completely?
